name: Simple Intelligent Systems
description:
A little Bit About Us
Hubspot certified Microsoft Bing Accredited Professional company  We are a group of highly skilled, dedicated and experienced developers. Over the past 10 years, we have developed a wide range of diverse websites and web applications using PHP and MYSQL. We have expertise in developing websites using PHP based CMS's such as WORDPRESS, JOOMLA, PRESTASHOP, MAGENTO etc. We also have very strong skills in HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, Jquery, and XML. We always adhere to industry standards to build ROBUST and SECURE websites and web applications. We have handled a wide range of third party API's & Web Services. Payment Gateways, Search Engine Optimization, building, implementing and customizing plugins, modules, components, themes/templates, blogs, portals etc.
 
On-Going Support
We are your partner even after sales. From conceptualization to implementation to maintenance, our technical support team will assist you with all of your needs and requests.
